messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Adam. May I have your name, please?
Hi Adam, this is David. I'm really upset about my recent bill.
I'm sorry to hear that, David. Could you please tell me more about the issue you're experiencing with your bill?
I was charged way more than I expected for the Gerber Goodstart Gentle Pro formula. This is ridiculous!
I understand your frustration, David. Let me pull up your account details and take a closer look at the charges. Could you please provide me with your billing account number?
Thank you, David. I see that there was an additional charge applied to your account. Let me verify why this charge was added.
This is unacceptable. I've been a loyal customer for years and now I'm being overcharged?

I apologize for the inconvenience, David. It seems the extra charge was due to a recent price adjustment that wasn't communicated properly. I can offer you a refund for the additional amount. Would that be acceptable?
A refund better be the least you can do. I hope this doesn't happen again.
I completely understand, David. I'll initiate the refund process right away and ensure that this issue is flagged so it doesn't recur. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, just make sure I get that refund. Thanks.
Absolutely, David. Your refund will be processed immediately. Have a great day!
